long_description: The Petzl Saka Chalk Bag has an ergonomic shape that allows easy access to the chalk so you can keep your hands dry when you're working through the crux moves. Cordlock closure system can be opened with only 1 hand should you forget to open the chalk bag before you start climbing. Reinforced rim maintains the shape of the bag. Elastic loop holds a brush (not included) for cleaning off holds. Wide, round shape allows for easy access to the chalk; supple fabric is comfortable to wear with a backpack on or when your back is against a rock wall. Microfleece interior liner resists matting and ensures good transfer of chalk to your hands; soft liner flap helps prevent accidentally losing chalk. The Petzl Saka Chalk Bag comes with an adjustable webbing belt.
